00203 BOOLEAN EnterInsuranceContract()
00204 {
00205   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00206       UINT16                              usPosX,i;
00207 
00208       //build the list of mercs that are can be displayed
00209       BuildInsuranceArray();
00210 
00211       gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids = GetNumberOfHireMercsStartingFromID( (UINT8) gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex );
00212       if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids > 3 )
00213             gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids = 3;
00214       
00215       InitInsuranceDefaults();
00216 
00217 
00218 
00219       // load the Insurance title graphic and add it
00220       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00221       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\InsOrderGrid.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00222       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsOrderGridImage));
00223 
00224       // load the Insurance bullet graphic and add it
00225       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00226       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\bullet.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00227       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsOrderBulletImage));
00228 
00229 
00230       usPosX = INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X;
00231       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00232       {
00233             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceContractLinkRegion[i], usPosX, INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_RED_BAR_Y-37, (UINT16)(usPosX + INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_WIDTH), INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_RED_BAR_Y+2, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00234                                      CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectInsuranceContractRegionCallBack); 
00235             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedInsuranceContractLinkRegion[i]); 
00236             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedInsuranceContractLinkRegion[i], 0, i );     
00237 
00238             usPosX += INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_OFFSET;
00239       }
00240 
00241 
00242       //left arrow
00243       guiInsContractPrevButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\InsLeftButton.sti", 2,0,-1,1,-1 );
00244       guiInsContractPrevBackButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiInsContractPrevButtonImage, InsContractText[INS_CONTRACT_PREVIOUS], INS_FONT_BIG, 
00245                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00246                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00247                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00248                                                                                INS_INFO_LEFT_ARROW_BUTTON_X, INS_INFO_LEFT_ARROW_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00249                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnInsContractPrevButtonCallback);
00250       SetButtonCursor( guiInsContractPrevBackButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00251       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( guiInsContractPrevBackButton, 17, 16, FALSE );
00252 
00253 
00254       //Right arrow
00255       guiInsContractNextButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\InsRightButton.sti", 2,0,-1,1,-1 );
00256       guiInsContractNextBackButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiInsContractNextButtonImage, InsContractText[INS_CONTRACT_NEXT], INS_FONT_BIG, 
00257                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00258                                                                                INS_FONT_COLOR, INS_FONT_SHADOW, 
00259                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00260                                                                                INS_INFO_RIGHT_ARROW_BUTTON_X, INS_INFO_RIGHT_ARROW_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00261                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnInsContractNextButtonCallBack);
00262       SetButtonCursor( guiInsContractNextBackButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00263       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( guiInsContractNextBackButton, 18, 16, FALSE );
00264 
00265       //create the new set of buttons
00266       CreateDestroyInsuranceContractFormButtons( TRUE );
00267 
00268 //    RenderInsuranceContract();
00269       return(TRUE);
00270 }

00272 void ExitInsuranceContract()
00273 {
00274       UINT8 i;
00275 
00276       RemoveInsuranceDefaults();
00277 
00278       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsOrderGridImage );
00279 
00280       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsOrderBulletImage );
00281 
00282       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00283             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceContractLinkRegion[i]);
00284 
00285       //the previous button
00286       UnloadButtonImage( guiInsContractPrevButtonImage );
00287       RemoveButton( guiInsContractPrevBackButton );
00288 
00289       //the next button
00290       UnloadButtonImage( guiInsContractNextButtonImage );
00291       RemoveButton( guiInsContractNextBackButton );
00292 
00293       CreateDestroyInsuranceContractFormButtons( FALSE );
00294 }

00297 
00298 void HandleInsuranceContract()
00299 {
00300       if( gfChangeInsuranceFormButtons )
00301       {
00302             //remove the old buttons from the page
00303             CreateDestroyInsuranceContractFormButtons( FALSE );
00304 
00305             //Get the new number of displayed insurance grids
00306             gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids = GetNumberOfHireMercsStartingFromID( (UINT8) gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex );
00307             if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids > 3 )
00308                   gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids = 3;
00309 
00310             //create the new set of buttons
00311             CreateDestroyInsuranceContractFormButtons( TRUE );
00312 
00313             //reset the flag
00314             gfChangeInsuranceFormButtons = FALSE;
00315 
00316             //force a redraw of the screen to erase the old buttons
00317             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
00318             RenderInsuranceContract();
00319 
00320             MarkButtonsDirty();
00321       }
00322 
00323       EnableDisableInsuranceContractAcceptButtons();
00324 }

00327 
00328 void RenderInsuranceContract()
00329 {
00330   HVOBJECT  hPixHandle;
00331       wchar_t           sText[800];
00332       UINT8             ubCount=0;
00333       INT16             sMercID;
00334       INT16             sNextMercID;
00335       UINT16            usPosX;
00336       BOOLEAN           fIsThereAnyAimMercs = FALSE;
00337       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00338 
00339 
00340       SetFontShadow( INS_FONT_SHADOW );
00341 
00342       DisplayInsuranceDefaults();
00343 
00344       //disable the next or previous button depending on how many more mercs we have to display
00345       DisableInsuranceContractNextPreviousbuttons();
00346 
00347       usPosX = INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X;
00348 
00349       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom.  and the text
00350       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( usPosX, INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_RED_BAR_Y, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_WIDTH), INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_RED_BAR_Y);
00351       swprintf( sText, L"%s", pMessageStrings[ MSG_HOMEPAGE ] );
00352       DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_Y+18, INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00353 
00354       usPosX += INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_OFFSET;
00355 
00356       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom.  and the text
00357       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( usPosX, INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_RED_BAR_Y, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_WIDTH), INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_RED_BAR_Y);
00358       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_HOW_DOES_INS_WORK, sText );
00359       DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, INS_CTRCT_BOTTON_LINK_Y+12, INS_CTRCT_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00360 
00361 
00362       //Display the title slogan
00363       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_ENTERING_REVIEWING_CLAIM, sText );
00364       DrawTextToScreen( sText, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, INS_CTRCT_TITLE_Y, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X-LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00365 
00366 
00367       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00368       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsOrderBulletImage );
00369       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_X, INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00370 
00371       //Display the first instruction sentence
00372       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_TO_PURCHASE_INSURANCE, sText );
00373       DisplayWrappedString( INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_Y, INS_CTRCT_INTSRUCTION_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00374 
00375 
00376       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00377       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsOrderBulletImage );
00378       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_X, INS_CTRCT_SECOND_BULLET_TEXT_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00379 
00380       //Display the second instruction sentence
00381       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_ONCE_SATISFIED_CLICK_ACCEPT, sText );
00382       DisplayWrappedString( INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, INS_CTRCT_SECOND_BULLET_TEXT_Y, INS_CTRCT_INTSRUCTION_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00383 
00384       //Display the red bar under the instruction text
00385       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_X, INS_CTRCT_RED_BAR_UNDER_INSTRUCTION_TEXT_Y, INS_CTRCT_FIRST_BULLET_TEXT_X+INS_CTRCT_INTSRUCTION_TEXT_WIDTH, INS_CTRCT_RED_BAR_UNDER_INSTRUCTION_TEXT_Y);
00386 
00387 
00388       sNextMercID =     gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex;
00389       while( ( ubCount < gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids ) && ( sNextMercID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID ) )
00390       {
00391             sMercID = gubInsuranceMercArray[ sNextMercID ];
00392 
00393             pSoldier = &Menptr[ GetSoldierIDFromMercID( (UINT8) sMercID ) ];
00394 
00395             if( ( sMercID != -1 ) && MercIsInsurable( pSoldier ) )
00396             {
00397                   DisplayOrderGrid( ubCount, (UINT8)sMercID );
00398                   ubCount++;
00399             }
00400 
00401             sNextMercID++;
00402       }
00403 
00404       //if there are no valid mercs to insure
00405       if( ubCount == 0 )
00406       {
00407             //if there where AIM mercs ( on short contract )
00408             if( AreAnyAimMercsOnTeam( ) )
00409             {
00410                   //Display Error Message, all aim mercs are on short contract
00411                   GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_ALL_AIM_MERCS_ON_SHORT_CONTRACT, sText );
00412                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_RED_ON_WHITE, sText, LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, InsContractNoMercsPopupCallBack);
00413             }
00414             else
00415             {
00416                   //Display Error Message, no valid mercs
00417                   GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_NO_QUALIFIED_MERCS, sText );
00418                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_RED_ON_WHITE, sText, LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, InsContractNoMercsPopupCallBack);
00419             }
00420       }
00421 
00422 
00423 
00424       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00425   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00426       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00427   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00428 }
00429

00433 
00434 void BtnInsContractPrevButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00435 {
00436       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00437       {
00438             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00439             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00440       }
00441       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00442       {
00443             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00444             {
00445                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00446 
00447                   if( gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex > 2 )
00448                         gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex -= 3;
00449 
00450                   //signal that we want to change the number of forms on the page
00451                   gfChangeInsuranceFormButtons = TRUE;
00452 
00453                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00454             }
00455       }
00456       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00457       {
00458             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00459             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00460       }
00461 } 
00462

00464 
00465 void BtnInsContractNextButtonCallBack(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00466 {
00467       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00468       {
00469             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00470             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00471       }
00472       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00473       {
00474             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00475             {
00476                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00477 
00478                   gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex += 3;
00479 
00480                   //signal that we want to change the number of forms on the page
00481                   gfChangeInsuranceFormButtons = TRUE;
00482  
00483                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00484             }
00485       }
00486       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00487       {
00488             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00489             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00490       }
00491 }

00494 
00495 
00496 BOOLEAN DisplayOrderGrid( UINT8 ubGridNumber, UINT8 ubMercID )
00497 {
00498   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00499   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00500       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
00501       UINT32      uiInsMercFaceImage;
00502       INT32       iCostOfContract=0;
00503       char              sTemp[100];
00504       wchar_t           sText[800];
00505       BOOLEAN           fDisplayMercContractStateTextColorInRed = FALSE;
00506 
00507       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00508 
00509       
00510       pSoldier = &Menptr[ GetSoldierIDFromMercID( ubMercID ) ];
00511 
00512 
00513       usPosX=usPosY=0;
00514 
00515       switch( ubGridNumber )
00516       {
00517             case 0:
00518                   usPosX = INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_X;
00519                   gubMercIDForMercInForm1 = ubMercID;
00520                   gsForm1InsuranceLengthNumber = (INT16) pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract;
00521                   break;
00522 
00523             case 1:
00524                   usPosX = INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID2_X;
00525                   gubMercIDForMercInForm2 = ubMercID;
00526                   gsForm2InsuranceLengthNumber = (INT16) pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract;
00527                   break;
00528 
00529             case 2:
00530                   usPosX = INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID3_X;
00531                   gubMercIDForMercInForm3 = ubMercID;
00532                   gsForm3InsuranceLengthNumber = (INT16) pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract;
00533                   break;
00534 
00535             default:
00536                   //should never get in here
00537                   Assert(0);
00538                   break;
00539       }
00540 
00541       //Get and display the insurance order grid #1
00542       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsOrderGridImage );
00543       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, usPosX, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00544 
00545 
00546       // load the mercs face graphic and add it
00547       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00548       sprintf(sTemp, "FACES\\%02d.sti", ubMercID);
00549       FilenameForBPP( sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00550       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiInsMercFaceImage));
00551 
00552       //Get the merc's face 
00553       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, uiInsMercFaceImage );
00554 
00555       //if the merc is dead, shade the face red
00556       if( IsMercDead( ubMercID ) )
00557       {
00558             //if the merc is dead
00559             //shade the face red, (to signify that he is dead)
00560             hPixHandle->pShades[ 0 ]            = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hPixHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
00561 
00562             //set the red pallete to the face
00563             SetObjectHandleShade( uiInsMercFaceImage, 0 );
00564       }
00565 
00566       //Get and display the mercs face 
00567       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_FACE_OFFSET_X, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_OG_FACE_OFFSET_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00568 
00569       // the face images isn't needed anymore so delete it
00570       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiInsMercFaceImage );
00571 
00572       //display the mercs nickname
00573       DrawTextToScreen(gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].zNickname, (UINT16)(usPosX + INS_CTRCT_OG_NICK_NAME_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y + INS_CTRCT_OG_NICK_NAME_OFFSET_Y, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED  );                
00574 
00575       //Get the text to display the mercs current insurance contract status
00576       if( IsMercDead( pSoldier->ubProfile ) )
00577       {
00578             //if the merc has a contract
00579             if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
00580             {
00581                   //Display the contract text
00582                   GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_DEAD_WITH_CONTRACT, sText );
00583             }
00584             else
00585             {
00586                   //Display the contract text
00587                   GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_DEAD_NO_CONTRACT, sText );
00588             }
00589             DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_HAS_CONTRACT_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_OG_HAS_CONTRACT_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_CONTRACT_STATUS_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_SMALL, INS_FONT_COLOR_RED,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00590       }
00591       else
00592       {
00593             //if the merc has a contract
00594             if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
00595             {
00596                   //if the soldier can extend their insurance
00597                   if( CanSoldierExtendInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) )
00598                   {
00599                         //Display the contract text
00600                         GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_PARTIALLY_INSURED, sText );
00601                         fDisplayMercContractStateTextColorInRed = TRUE;
00602                   }
00603                   else
00604                   {
00605                         //Display the contract text
00606                         GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_CONTRACT, sText );
00607                         fDisplayMercContractStateTextColorInRed = FALSE;
00608                   }
00609             }
00610             else
00611             {
00612                   //Display the contract text
00613                   GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_NOCONTRACT, sText );
00614                   fDisplayMercContractStateTextColorInRed = TRUE;
00615             }
00616             if( fDisplayMercContractStateTextColorInRed )
00617                   DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_HAS_CONTRACT_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_OG_HAS_CONTRACT_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_CONTRACT_STATUS_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_SMALL, INS_FONT_COLOR_RED,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00618             else
00619                   DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_HAS_CONTRACT_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_OG_HAS_CONTRACT_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_CONTRACT_STATUS_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_SMALL, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00620       }
00621 
00622 
00623 
00624       //Display the Emplyment contract text
00625       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_EMPLOYMENT_CONTRACT, sText );
00626       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_EMPLYMNT_CNTRCT_TEXT_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_EMPLYMNT_CNTRCT_TEXT_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00627 
00628       //Display the merc contract Length text
00629       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_LENGTH, sText );
00630       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_Y, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00631 
00632       //Display the mercs contract length
00633       swprintf( sText, L"%d", pSoldier->iTotalContractLength ); 
00634       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
00635 
00636 
00637       //Display the days remaining for the emplyment contract text
00638       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_DAYS_REMAINING, sText );
00639       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_DAYS_REMAINING_OFFSET_Y, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00640 
00641 
00642       //display the amount of time the merc has left on their Regular contract
00643       if( IsMercDead( ubMercID ) )
00644             swprintf( sText, L"%s", pMessageStrings[ MSG_LOWERCASE_NA ] ); 
00645       else
00646             swprintf( sText, L"%d", GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract( pSoldier ) ); 
00647 
00648       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_DAYS_REMAINING_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
00649 
00650       //Display the Insurqance contract
00651       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_INSURANCE_CONTRACT, sText );
00652       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_EMPLYMNT_CNTRCT_TEXT_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_INSURANCE_CNTRCT_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00653 
00654 
00655       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_LENGTH, sText );
00656       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_Y+54, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00657 
00658       //Display the insurance days remaining text
00659       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_DAYS_REMAINING, sText );
00660       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_DAYS_REMAINING_OFFSET_Y+54, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00661 
00662 
00663 
00664       //
00665       //display the amount of time the merc has left on the insurance contract
00666       //
00667 
00668       //if the soldier has insurance, disply the length of time the merc has left
00669       if( IsMercDead( ubMercID ) )
00670             swprintf( sText, L"%s", pMessageStrings[ MSG_LOWERCASE_NA ] ); 
00671 
00672       else if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance != 0 )
00673             swprintf( sText, L"%d", GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) ); 
00674 
00675       else
00676             swprintf( sText, L"%d", 0 ); 
00677 
00678       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_DAYS_REMAINING_OFFSET_Y+54, INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
00679 
00680 
00681       //
00682       // Calculate the insurance cost
00683       //
00684 
00685       //if the soldier can get insurance, calculate a new cost
00686       if( CanSoldierExtendInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) )
00687       {
00688             iCostOfContract =CalculateInsuranceContractCost( CalculateSoldiersInsuranceContractLength( pSoldier ), pSoldier->ubProfile );
00689       }
00690 
00691       else
00692       {
00693             iCostOfContract = 0;
00694       }
00695 
00696       if( iCostOfContract < 0 )
00697       {
00698             //shouldnt get in here now since we can longer give refunds
00699             Assert( 0 );
00700       }
00701       else
00702       {
00703             //Display the premium owing text
00704             GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_PREMIUM_OWING, sText );
00705             DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_EMPLYMNT_CNTRCT_TEXT_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_PREMIUM_OWING_OFFSET_Y, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00706 
00707             //display the amount of refund
00708             swprintf( sText, L"%d", iCostOfContract ); 
00709             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sText );
00710             InsertDollarSignInToString( sText );
00711       }
00712 
00713 
00714       if( IsMercDead( ubMercID ) )
00715       {
00716             swprintf( sText, L"0"); 
00717             InsertDollarSignInToString( sText );
00718       }
00719       //display the amount owing
00720       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+32), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+179, 72, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
00721 
00722 
00723 
00724       //
00725       // Get the insurance contract length for the merc
00726       //
00727       swprintf( sText, L"%d", CalculateSoldiersInsuranceContractLength( pSoldier ) );
00728 
00729 
00730       //Display the length of time the player can get for the insurance contract
00731       DrawTextToScreen( sText, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_OFFSET_X), INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_LENGTH_OFFSET_Y+52+2, INS_CTRCT_OG_BOX_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
00732 
00733       return( TRUE );
00734 }

00737 
00738 void BtnInsuranceAcceptClearForm1ButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00739 {
00740       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00741       {
00742             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00743             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00744       }
00745       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00746       {
00747             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00748             {
00749                   UINT8 ubButton = (UINT8) MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00750                   UINT8 ubSoldierID = (UINT8) GetSoldierIDFromMercID( gubMercIDForMercInForm1 );
00751 
00752                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00753 
00754                   //the accept button
00755                   if( ubButton == 0 )
00756                   {
00757                         //handle the accept button, (global to all accept button
00758                         HandleAcceptButton( ubSoldierID, 1 );
00759 
00760                         //specify the length of the insurance contract
00761                         Menptr[ ubSoldierID ].iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract = gsForm1InsuranceLengthNumber;
00762 
00763                         //reset the insurance length
00764                         gsForm1InsuranceLengthNumber = 0;
00765                   }
00766 
00767                   //redraw the screen
00768                   fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00769 
00770                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00771             }
00772       }
00773       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00774       {
00775             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00776             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00777       }
00778 }

00870 
00871 INT8 GetNumberOfHireMercsStartingFromID( UINT8 ubStartMercID )
00872 {
00873       UINT8 i;
00874       UINT8 ubCount=0;
00875 
00876       for( i=0; i<gsMaxPlayersOnTeam; i++)
00877       {
00878             if( i>= ubStartMercID )
00879             {
00880                   ubCount++;
00881             }
00882       }
00883 
00884       return( ubCount );
00885 }

00888 /*
00889 INT32 CalculateInsuranceCost( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fHaveInsurance )
00890 {
00891       INT32             iAmount=0;
00892       UINT32            uiInsuranceContractLength = 0;
00893 
00894       uiInsuranceContractLength = CalculateSoldiersInsuranceContractLength( pSoldier );
00895 
00896       //If the soldier already has life insurance, then the user is changing the length of the contract
00897       if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
00898       {
00899             //if the user is changing the contract length
00900             if( uiInsuranceContractLength != 0 )
00901             {
00902                   iAmount = CalculateInsuranceContractCost( uiInsuranceContractLength, pSoldier->ubProfile);
00903             }
00904             //else we are just calculating the new figure
00905             else
00906             {
00907                   iAmount = 0;
00908             }
00909       }
00910       //else the merc doesn't have life insurance
00911       else
00912       {
00913             iAmount = CalculateInsuranceContractCost( uiInsuranceContractLength, pSoldier->ubProfile);
00914       }
00915 
00916       return( iAmount );
00917 }

00919 
00920 void SelectInsuranceContractRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00921 { 
00922       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00923       {
00924       }
00925       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00926       {
00927             UINT32 uiInsuranceLink = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00928 
00929             if( uiInsuranceLink == 0 )
00930                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE;
00931             else if( uiInsuranceLink == 1 )
00932                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_INFO;
00933       }
00934       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00935       {
00936       } 
00937 }
00938 
00939 INT8 CountInsurableMercs()
00940 {
00941       INT16                         cnt;
00942       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00943       INT16                         bLastTeamID;
00944       INT8                          bCount=0;
00945 
00946       // Set locator to first merc
00947       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00948       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
00949 
00950   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00951       {     
00952             if (MercIsInsurable(pSoldier))
00953             {
00954                   bCount++;
00955             }
00956       }
00957 
00958       return( bCount );
00959 }
00960 
00961 void DisableInsuranceContractNextPreviousbuttons()
00962 {
00963       //disable the next button if there is no more mercs to display
00964       if( ( gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex + gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids ) < CountInsurableMercs() )
00965       {
00966             EnableButton( guiInsContractNextBackButton );
00967       }
00968       else
00969             DisableButton( guiInsContractNextBackButton );
00970 
00971       //if we are currently displaying the first set of mercs, disable the previous button
00972       if( gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex < 3 )
00973       {
00974             DisableButton( guiInsContractPrevBackButton );
00975       }
00976       else
00977             EnableButton( guiInsContractPrevBackButton );
00978 
00979 }
00980 
00981 void CreateDestroyInsuranceContractFormButtons( BOOLEAN fCreate)
00982 {
00983       static BOOLEAN    fButtonsCreated = FALSE;
00984 
00985       if( fCreate && !fButtonsCreated )
00986       {
00987             //place the 3 accept buttons for the different forms
00988 
00989             //The accept button image
00990             guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1ButtonImage   = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\AcceptClearBox.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00991 
00992             if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 1 ) 
00993             {
00994                   //the accept button for form 1
00995                   guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1Button = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1ButtonImage, InsContractText[INS_CONTRACT_ACCEPT], INS_FONT_MED, 
00996                                                                                            INS_FONT_BTN_COLOR, INS_FONT_BTN_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00997                                                                                            INS_FONT_BTN_COLOR, INS_FONT_BTN_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00998                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00999                                                                                            INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_X+INS_CTRCT_ACCEPT_BTN_X, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_ACCEPT_BTN_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01000                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnInsuranceAcceptClearForm1ButtonCallback);
01001                   SetButtonCursor( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1Button, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN );
01002                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1Button, 0, 0);
01003             }
01004 
01005 
01006 
01007             if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 2 ) 
01008             {
01009                   //the accept button for form 2
01010                   guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm2Button = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1ButtonImage, InsContractText[INS_CONTRACT_ACCEPT], INS_FONT_MED, 
01011                                                                                            INS_FONT_BTN_COLOR, INS_FONT_BTN_SHADOW_COLOR, 
01012                                                                                            INS_FONT_BTN_COLOR, INS_FONT_BTN_SHADOW_COLOR, 
01013                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
01014                                                                                            INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID2_X+INS_CTRCT_ACCEPT_BTN_X, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_ACCEPT_BTN_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01015                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnInsuranceAcceptClearForm2ButtonCallback);
01016                   SetButtonCursor(guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm2Button, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN );
01017                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm2Button, 0, 0);
01018             
01019             }
01020                   
01021 
01022 
01023 
01024             if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 3 ) 
01025             {
01026                   //the accept button for form 3
01027                   guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm3Button = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1ButtonImage, InsContractText[INS_CONTRACT_ACCEPT], INS_FONT_MED, 
01028                                                                                            INS_FONT_BTN_COLOR, INS_FONT_BTN_SHADOW_COLOR, 
01029                                                                                            INS_FONT_BTN_COLOR, INS_FONT_BTN_SHADOW_COLOR, 
01030                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
01031                                                                                            INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID3_X+INS_CTRCT_ACCEPT_BTN_X, INS_CTRCT_ORDER_GRID1_Y+INS_CTRCT_ACCEPT_BTN_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01032                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnInsuranceAcceptClearForm3ButtonCallback);
01033                   SetButtonCursor( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm3Button, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN );
01034                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm3Button, 0, 0);
01035             }
01036 
01037             fButtonsCreated = TRUE;
01038       }
01039 
01040       if( fButtonsCreated && ! fCreate )
01041       {
01042             //the accept image 
01043             UnloadButtonImage( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1ButtonImage );
01044 
01045             if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 1 )
01046             {
01047                   //the accept for the first form 
01048                   RemoveButton( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1Button );
01049             }
01050 
01051             if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 2 )
01052             {
01053                   //the accept clear for the second form 
01054                   RemoveButton( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm2Button );
01055             }
01056 
01057             if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 3 )
01058             {
01059                   //the accept clear for the third form 
01060                   RemoveButton( guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm3Button );
01061             }
01062 
01063             fButtonsCreated = FALSE;
01064       }
01065 }

01069 void HandleAcceptButton( UINT8 ubSoldierID, UINT8 ubFormID )
01070 {
01071       INT32 iAmountOfMoneyTransfer = -1;
01072 
01073       //passed in either 1,2,3 should be 0,1,2
01074       ubFormID--;
01075 
01076       PurchaseOrExtendInsuranceForSoldier( &Menptr[ ubSoldierID ], CalculateSoldiersInsuranceContractLength( &Menptr[ ubSoldierID ] ) );
01077 
01078       RenderInsuranceContract();
01079 }

01088 
01089 // determines if a merc will run out of their insurance contract
01090 void DailyUpdateOfInsuredMercs()
01091 {
01092       INT16       cnt;
01093       INT16       bLastTeamID;
01094       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
01095 
01096       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01097       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
01098 
01099   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
01100       {     
01101             //if the soldier is in the team array
01102             if( pSoldier->bActive )
01103             {
01104                   //if the merc has life insurance
01105                   if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
01106                   {
01107                         //if the merc wasn't just hired
01108                         if( (INT16)GetWorldDay() != pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract )
01109                         {
01110                               //if the contract has run out of time
01111                               if( GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) <= 0 )
01112                               {
01113                                     //if the soldier isn't dead
01114                                     if( !IsMercDead( pSoldier->ubProfile ) )
01115                                     {
01116                                           pSoldier->usLifeInsurance = 0;
01117                                           pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract = 0;
01118                                           pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract = 0;
01119                                     }
01120                               }
01121                         }
01122                   }
01123             }
01124       }
01125 }
01126 
01127 
01128 #define MIN_INSURANCE_RATIO          0.1f
01129 #define MAX_INSURANCE_RATIO         10.0f
01130 
01131 
01132 INT32 CalculateInsuranceContractCost( INT32 iLength, UINT8 ubMercID )
01133 {
01134       MERCPROFILESTRUCT * pProfile;
01135       INT16 sTotalSkill=0;
01136       FLOAT flSkillFactor, flFitnessFactor, flExpFactor, flSurvivalFactor;
01137       FLOAT flRiskFactor;
01138       UINT32 uiDailyInsurancePremium;
01139       UINT32 uiTotalInsurancePremium;
01140       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01141 
01142       
01143       pSoldier = &Menptr[ GetSoldierIDFromMercID( ubMercID ) ];
01144 
01145 
01146       // only mercs with at least 2 days to go on their employment contract are insurable
01147       // def: 2/5/99.  However if they already have insurance is SHOULD be ok
01148       if( GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract( pSoldier ) < 2 && !( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance != 0 && GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract( pSoldier ) >= 1 ) )
01149       {
01150             return( 0 );
01151       }
01152 
01153       //If the merc is currently being held captive, get out
01154       if (pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW)
01155       {
01156             return( 0 );
01157       }
01158 
01159 /*
01160       replaced with the above check 
01161 
01162       if (iLength < 2)
01163       {
01164             return(0);
01165       }
01166       */
01167 
01168       pProfile = &gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ];
01169 
01170       // calculate the degree of training
01171       sTotalSkill = (pProfile->bMarksmanship + pProfile->bMedical + pProfile->bMechanical + pProfile->bExplosive + pProfile->bLeadership) / 5;
01172       flSkillFactor = DiffFromNormRatio( sTotalSkill, INS_CTRCT_SKILL_BASE );
01173 
01174       // calc relative fitness level
01175       flFitnessFactor = DiffFromNormRatio( pProfile->bLife, INS_CTRCT_FITNESS_BASE );
01176 
01177       // calc relative experience
01178       flExpFactor = DiffFromNormRatio( pProfile->bExpLevel, INS_CTRCT_EXP_LEVEL_BASE );
01179 
01180       // calc player's survival rate (death rate subtracted from 100)
01181       flSurvivalFactor = DiffFromNormRatio( (INT16) (100 - CalcDeathRate()), INS_CTRCT_SURVIVAL_BASE );
01182 
01183       // calculate the overall insurability risk factor for this merc by combining all the subfactors
01184       flRiskFactor = flSkillFactor * flFitnessFactor * flExpFactor * flSurvivalFactor;
01185 
01186       // restrict the overall factor to within reasonable limits
01187       if (flRiskFactor < MIN_INSURANCE_RATIO)
01188       {
01189             flRiskFactor = MIN_INSURANCE_RATIO;
01190       }
01191       else
01192       if (flRiskFactor > MAX_INSURANCE_RATIO)
01193       {
01194             flRiskFactor = MAX_INSURANCE_RATIO;
01195       }
01196 
01197       // premium depend on merc's salary, the base insurance rate, and the individual's risk factor at this time
01198       uiDailyInsurancePremium = (UINT32) (((pProfile->sSalary * INSURANCE_PREMIUM_RATE * flRiskFactor) / 100) + 0.5);
01199       // multiply by the insurance contract length
01200       uiTotalInsurancePremium = uiDailyInsurancePremium * iLength;
01201 
01202       return( uiTotalInsurancePremium );
01203 }
01204 
01205 
01206 // values passed in must be such that exceeding the normal value REDUCES insurance premiums
01207 FLOAT DiffFromNormRatio( INT16 sThisValue, INT16 sNormalValue )
01208 {
01209       FLOAT flRatio;
01210 
01211       if (sThisValue > 0)
01212       {
01213             flRatio = (FLOAT) sNormalValue / sThisValue;
01214 
01215             // restrict each ratio to within a reasonable range
01216             if (flRatio < MIN_INSURANCE_RATIO)
01217             {
01218                   flRatio = MIN_INSURANCE_RATIO;
01219             }
01220             else
01221             if (flRatio > MAX_INSURANCE_RATIO)
01222             {
01223                   flRatio = MAX_INSURANCE_RATIO;
01224             }
01225       }
01226       else
01227       {
01228             // use maximum allowable ratio
01229             flRatio = MAX_INSURANCE_RATIO;
01230       }
01231 
01232       return( flRatio );
01233 }
01234 
01235 
01236 void InsContractNoMercsPopupCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
01237 {
01238       // yes, so start over, else stay here and do nothing for now
01239   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK )
01240       {
01241             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE;
01242       }
01243 
01244       return;
01245 }
01246 
01247 void BuildInsuranceArray()
01248 {
01249       INT16                         cnt;
01250       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
01251       INT16                         bLastTeamID;
01252 
01253       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01254       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
01255       gsMaxPlayersOnTeam = 0;
01256 
01257       // store profile #s of all insurable mercs in an array
01258   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
01259       {     
01260             if( MercIsInsurable(pSoldier) )
01261             {
01262                   gubInsuranceMercArray[ gsMaxPlayersOnTeam ] = pSoldier->ubProfile;
01263                   gsMaxPlayersOnTeam++;
01264             }
01265       }
01266 }
01267 
01268 
01269 BOOLEAN AddLifeInsurancePayout( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01270 {
01271       UINT8 ubPayoutID;
01272       UINT32 uiTimeInMinutes;
01273       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile;
01274       UINT32 uiCostPerDay;
01275       UINT32 uiDaysToPay;
01276 
01277 
01278       Assert(pSoldier != NULL);
01279       Assert(pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE);
01280 
01281       pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ]);
01282 
01283       //if we need to add more array elements
01284       if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts <= LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayoutUsed )
01285       {
01286             LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts++;
01287             LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts = (LIFE_INSURANCE_PAYOUT *) MemRealloc( LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts, sizeof( LIFE_INSURANCE_PAYOUT ) * LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts  );
01288             if( LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts == NULL )
01289                   return( FALSE );
01290 
01291             memset( &LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts - 1 ], 0, sizeof( LIFE_INSURANCE_PAYOUT ) );
01292       }
01293 
01294       for( ubPayoutID = 0; ubPayoutID < LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts; ubPayoutID++ )
01295       {
01296             //get an empty element in the array
01297             if( !LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].fActive )
01298                   break;
01299       }
01300 
01301       LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
01302       LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID = pSoldier->ubProfile;
01303       LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].fActive = TRUE;
01304 
01305       // This uses the merc's latest salaries, ignoring that they may be higher than the salaries paid under the current
01306       // contract if the guy has recently gained a level.  We could store his daily salary when he was last contracted,
01307       // and use that, but it still doesn't easily account for the fact that renewing a leveled merc early means that the
01308       // first part of his contract is under his old salary and the second part is under his new one.  Therefore, I chose
01309       // to ignore this wrinkle, and let the player awlays get paid out using the higher amount.  ARM
01310 
01311       // figure out which of the 3 salary rates the merc has is the cheapest, and use it to calculate the paid amount, to
01312       // avoid getting back more than the merc cost if he was on a 2-week contract!
01313 
01314       // start with the daily salary
01315       uiCostPerDay = pProfile->sSalary;
01316 
01317       // consider weekly salary / day
01318       if ((pProfile->uiWeeklySalary / 7) < uiCostPerDay)
01319       {
01320             uiCostPerDay = (pProfile->uiWeeklySalary / 7);
01321       }
01322 
01323       // consider biweekly salary / day
01324       if ((pProfile->uiBiWeeklySalary / 14) < uiCostPerDay)
01325       {
01326             uiCostPerDay = (pProfile->uiBiWeeklySalary / 14);
01327       }
01328 
01329       // calculate how many full, insured days of work the merc is going to miss
01330       uiDaysToPay = pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract - ( GetWorldDay() + 1 - pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract );
01331 
01332       // calculate & store how much is to be paid out
01333       LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].iPayOutPrice = uiDaysToPay * uiCostPerDay;
01334 
01335       // 4pm next day
01336       uiTimeInMinutes = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( 1 ) + 16 * 60;
01337 
01338       // if the death was suspicious, or he's already been investigated twice or more
01339       if (pProfile->ubSuspiciousDeath || (gStrategicStatus.ubInsuranceInvestigationsCnt >= 2))
01340       {
01341             // fraud suspected, claim will be investigated first
01342             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_INSURANCE_INVESTIGATION_STARTED, uiTimeInMinutes, ubPayoutID );
01343       }
01344       else
01345       {
01346             // is ok, make a prompt payment
01347             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_PAY_LIFE_INSURANCE_FOR_DEAD_MERC, uiTimeInMinutes, ubPayoutID );
01348       }
01349 
01350       LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayoutUsed++;
01351 
01352       return( TRUE );
01353 }
01354 
01355 
01356 void StartInsuranceInvestigation( UINT8   ubPayoutID )
01357 {
01358       UINT8 ubDays;
01359 
01360       // send an email telling player an investigation is taking place
01361       if (gStrategicStatus.ubInsuranceInvestigationsCnt == 0)
01362       {
01363             // first offense
01364             AddEmailWithSpecialData( INSUR_SUSPIC, INSUR_SUSPIC_LENGTH, INSURANCE_COMPANY, GetWorldTotalMin(), LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].iPayOutPrice, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID );
01365       }
01366       else
01367       {
01368             // subsequent offense
01369             AddEmailWithSpecialData( INSUR_SUSPIC_2, INSUR_SUSPIC_2_LENGTH, INSURANCE_COMPANY, GetWorldTotalMin(), LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].iPayOutPrice, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID );
01370       }
01371 
01372       if ( gMercProfiles[ LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID ].ubSuspiciousDeath == VERY_SUSPICIOUS_DEATH )
01373       {
01374             // the fact that you tried to cheat them gets realized very quickly. :-)
01375             ubDays = 1;
01376       }
01377       else
01378       {
01379             // calculate how many days the investigation will take
01380             ubDays = (UINT8) (2 + gStrategicStatus.ubInsuranceInvestigationsCnt + Random(3));         // 2-4 days, +1 for every previous investigation
01381       }
01382 
01383       // post an event to end the investigation that many days in the future (at 4pm)
01384       AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_INSURANCE_INVESTIGATION_OVER, GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( ubDays ) + 16 * 60, ubPayoutID );
01385 
01386       // increment counter of all investigations
01387       gStrategicStatus.ubInsuranceInvestigationsCnt++;
01388 }
01389 
01390 
01391 void EndInsuranceInvestigation( UINT8     ubPayoutID )
01392 {
01393       // send an email telling player the investigation is over
01394       if ( gMercProfiles[ LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID ].ubSuspiciousDeath == VERY_SUSPICIOUS_DEATH )
01395       {
01396             // fraud, no payout!
01397             AddEmailWithSpecialData( INSUR_1HOUR_FRAUD, INSUR_1HOUR_FRAUD_LENGTH, INSURANCE_COMPANY, GetWorldTotalMin(), LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].iPayOutPrice, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID );
01398       }
01399       else
01400       {
01401             AddEmailWithSpecialData( INSUR_INVEST_OVER, INSUR_INVEST_OVER_LENGTH, INSURANCE_COMPANY, GetWorldTotalMin(), LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].iPayOutPrice, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID );
01402 
01403             // only now make a payment (immediately)
01404             InsuranceContractPayLifeInsuranceForDeadMerc( ubPayoutID );
01405       }
01406 }
01407 
01408 
01409 //void InsuranceContractPayLifeInsuranceForDeadMerc( LIFE_INSURANCE_PAYOUT *pPayoutStruct )
01410 void InsuranceContractPayLifeInsuranceForDeadMerc( UINT8 ubPayoutID )
01411 {
01412       //if the mercs id number is the same what is in the soldier array
01413       if( LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubSoldierID == Menptr[ LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubSoldierID ].ubID )
01414       {
01415             // and if the soldier is still active ( player hasn't removed carcass yet ), reset insurance flag
01416             if( Menptr[ LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubSoldierID ].bActive )
01417                   Menptr[ LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubSoldierID ].usLifeInsurance = 0;
01418       }
01419 
01420       //add transaction to players account
01421       AddTransactionToPlayersBook( INSURANCE_PAYOUT, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID, GetWorldTotalMin(), LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].iPayOutPrice );
01422 
01423       //add to the history log the fact that the we paid the insurance claim
01424       AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_INSURANCE_CLAIM_PAYOUT, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID, GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
01425 
01426       //if there WASNT an investigation
01427       if( gMercProfiles[ LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID ].ubSuspiciousDeath == 0 )
01428       {
01429             //Add an email telling the user that he received an insurance payment
01430             AddEmailWithSpecialData( INSUR_PAYMENT, INSUR_PAYMENT_LENGTH, INSURANCE_COMPANY, GetWorldTotalMin(), LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].iPayOutPrice, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].ubMercID );
01431       }
01432 
01433       LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayoutUsed --;
01434       LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts[ ubPayoutID ].fActive = FALSE;
01435 //    MemFree( pPayoutStruct );
01436 }
01437 
01438 
01439 //Gets called at the very end of the game
01440 void InsuranceContractEndGameShutDown()
01441 {
01442       //Free up the memory allocated to the insurance payouts
01443       if( LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts )
01444       {
01445             MemFree( LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts );
01446             LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts = NULL;
01447       }
01448 }
01449 
01450 
01451 BOOLEAN MercIsInsurable( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01452 {
01453       // only A.I.M. mercs currently on player's team
01454       if( ( pSoldier->bActive ) && ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC ) )
01455       {
01456             // with more than one day left on their employment contract are eligible for insurance
01457             // the second part is because the insurance doesn't pay for any working day already started at time of death
01458 //          if( ( (pSoldier->iEndofContractTime - GetWorldTotalMin()) > 24 * 60) || pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
01459             if( CanSoldierExtendInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) || pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
01460             {
01461                   // who aren't currently being held POW
01462                   // POWs are also uninsurable - if already insured, that insurance IS valid but no new contracts or extension allowed
01463                   if (pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW)
01464                   {
01465                         return(TRUE);
01466                   }
01467             }
01468       }
01469 
01470       return(FALSE);
01471 }
01472 
01473 
01474 void EnableDisableInsuranceContractAcceptButtons()
01475 {
01476       //If it is the first grid
01477       if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 1 )
01478       {
01479             EnableDisableIndividualInsuranceContractButton( gubMercIDForMercInForm1, &guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm1Button );
01480       }
01481 
01482       //If it is the 2nd grid
01483       if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 2 )
01484       {
01485             EnableDisableIndividualInsuranceContractButton( gubMercIDForMercInForm2, &guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm2Button );
01486       }
01487       
01488       //If it is the 3rd grid
01489       if( gubNumberofDisplayedInsuranceGrids >= 3 )
01490       {
01491             EnableDisableIndividualInsuranceContractButton( gubMercIDForMercInForm3, &guiInsuranceAcceptClearForm3Button );
01492       }
01493 }
01494 
01495 
01496 void EnableDisableIndividualInsuranceContractButton( UINT8 ubMercIDForMercInForm, UINT32 *puiAcceptButton )
01497 {
01498       INT16 sSoldierID = 0;
01499 
01500       sSoldierID = GetSoldierIDFromMercID( ubMercIDForMercInForm );
01501       if( sSoldierID == - 1)
01502             return;
01503 
01504       // if the soldiers contract can be extended, enable the button
01505       if( CanSoldierExtendInsuranceContract( &Menptr[ sSoldierID ] ) )
01506             EnableButton( *puiAcceptButton );
01507             
01508       // else the soldier cant extend their insurance contract, disable the button
01509       else
01510             DisableButton( *puiAcceptButton );
01511 
01512       //if the merc is dead, disable the button
01513       if( IsMercDead( ubMercIDForMercInForm ) )
01514             DisableButton( *puiAcceptButton );
01515 }

01518 /*

01523

01528                   break;

01546 
01547 UINT32      GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01548 {
01549       //if the soldier has life insurance
01550       if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
01551       {
01552             //if the insurance contract hasnt started yet
01553             if( (INT32)GetWorldDay() < pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract )
01554                   return( pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract );
01555             else
01556                   return( ( pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract - ( GetWorldDay() - pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract ) ) );
01557       }
01558       else
01559             return( 0 );
01560 }
01561 
01562 UINT32      GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01563 {
01564       INT32 iDayMercLeaves = ( pSoldier->iEndofContractTime / 1440 ) - 1;
01565 
01566       //Since the merc is leaving in the afternoon, we must adjust since the time left would be different if we did the calc
01567       //at 11:59 or 12:01 ( noon )
01568       if( pSoldier->iEndofContractTime % 1440 )
01569             iDayMercLeaves++;
01570 
01571       // Subtract todays day number
01572       iDayMercLeaves = iDayMercLeaves - GetWorldDay();
01573 
01574       if( iDayMercLeaves > pSoldier->iTotalContractLength )
01575             iDayMercLeaves = pSoldier->iTotalContractLength;
01576 
01577       return( iDayMercLeaves );
01578 //    return( ( pSoldier->iEndofContractTime - (INT32)GetWorldTotalMin( ) ) / 1440 );
01579 }
01580 
01581 
01582 void PurchaseOrExtendInsuranceForSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT32 uiInsuranceLength )
01583 {
01584       INT32 iAmountOfMoneyTransfer = -1;
01585 
01586       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01587             AssertMsg( 0, "Soldier pointer is NULL!" );
01588 
01589       //if the user doesnt have insruance already, 
01590       if( !(pSoldier->usLifeInsurance ) )
01591       {
01592             //specify the start date of the contract
01593             pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract = CalcStartDayOfInsurance( pSoldier );
01594             pSoldier->uiStartTimeOfInsuranceContract = GetWorldTotalMin();
01595       }
01596 
01597       //transfer money
01598       iAmountOfMoneyTransfer = CalculateInsuranceContractCost( uiInsuranceLength, pSoldier->ubProfile );
01599 
01600       //if the user did have insruance already, 
01601       if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
01602       {
01603             //specify the start date of the contract
01604             pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract = CalcStartDayOfInsurance( pSoldier );
01605       }
01606 
01607       //add transaction to finaces page
01608       //if the player has life insurance
01609       if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance )
01610       {
01611             //if the player is extending the contract
01612             if( iAmountOfMoneyTransfer > 0 )
01613                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook(  EXTENDED_INSURANCE, pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin(), -( iAmountOfMoneyTransfer ) );
01614             else
01615                   Assert(0);
01616       }
01617       else
01618       {
01619             //if the player doesnt have enough money, tell him
01620             if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance < iAmountOfMoneyTransfer )
01621             {
01622                   wchar_t           sText[800];
01623 
01624                   GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_NOT_ENOUGH_FUNDS, sText );
01625                   if( guiCurrentScreen == LAPTOP_SCREEN )
01626                         DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_RED_ON_WHITE, sText, LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
01627                   else
01628                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_RED_ON_WHITE, (INT16 *)sText, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
01629             }
01630             else
01631             {
01632                   //else if the player has enought to cover the bill, let him 
01633 
01634                   //the player just purchased life insurance
01635                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook(  PURCHASED_INSURANCE, pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin(), -( iAmountOfMoneyTransfer ) );
01636 
01637                   //add an entry in the history page for the purchasing of life insurance
01638                   AddHistoryToPlayersLog(HISTORY_PURCHASED_INSURANCE, pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
01639 
01640                   //Set that we have life insurance
01641                   pSoldier->usLifeInsurance = 1;
01642             }
01643       }
01644 
01645       pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract += uiInsuranceLength;
01646 
01647       //make sure the length doesnt exceed the contract length
01648       if( ( GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) ) > GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract( pSoldier ) )
01649       {
01650             pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract -= GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) - GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract( pSoldier );
01651       }
01652 }
01653 
01654 BOOLEAN     CanSoldierExtendInsuranceContract( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01655 {
01656       if( CalculateSoldiersInsuranceContractLength( pSoldier ) != 0 )
01657             return( TRUE );
01658       else
01659             return( FALSE );
01660 }
01661 
01662 
01663 INT32 CalculateSoldiersInsuranceContractLength( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01664 {
01665       INT32 iInsuranceContractLength=0;
01666       UINT32 uiTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract = GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract( pSoldier );
01667 
01668 
01669       //if the merc is dead
01670       if( IsMercDead( pSoldier->ubProfile ) )
01671             return( 0 );
01672 
01673 
01674       // only mercs with at least 2 days to go on their employment contract are insurable
01675       // def: 2/5/99.  However if they already have insurance is SHOULD be ok
01676       if( uiTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract < 2 && !( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance != 0 && uiTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract >= 1 ) )
01677       {
01678             return( 0 );
01679       }
01680 
01681       //
01682       //Calculate the insurance contract length
01683       //
01684 
01685       //if the soldier has an insurance contract, dont deduct a day
01686       if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance || DidGameJustStart() )
01687             iInsuranceContractLength = uiTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract - GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier );
01688 
01689       //else deduct a day
01690       else
01691             iInsuranceContractLength = uiTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract - GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) - 1;
01692 
01693       //make sure the length doesnt exceed the contract length
01694       if( ( GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier ) + iInsuranceContractLength ) > uiTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract )
01695       {
01696             iInsuranceContractLength = uiTimeRemainingOnSoldiersContract - GetTimeRemainingOnSoldiersInsuranceContract( pSoldier );
01697       }
01698 
01699       //Is the mercs insurace contract is less then a day, set it to 0
01700       if( iInsuranceContractLength < 0 )
01701             iInsuranceContractLength = 0;
01702 
01703       if( pSoldier->usLifeInsurance && pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract >= (INT32)GetWorldDay() && iInsuranceContractLength < 2 )
01704             iInsuranceContractLength = 0;
01705 
01706       return( iInsuranceContractLength );
01707 }
01708 
01709 INT32 CalcStartDayOfInsurance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01710 {
01711       UINT32      uiDayToStartInsurance=0;
01712 
01713       //if the soldier was just hired ( in transit ), and the game didnt just start
01714       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT && !DidGameJustStart() )
01715       {
01716             uiDayToStartInsurance = GetWorldDay( );
01717       }
01718       else
01719       {
01720             //Get tomorows date ( and convert it to days )
01721             uiDayToStartInsurance = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( 1 ) / 1440;
01722       }
01723 
01724       return( uiDayToStartInsurance );
01725 }
01726 
01727 BOOLEAN AreAnyAimMercsOnTeam( )
01728 {
01729       INT16 sNextMercID = 0;
01730       BOOLEAN fIsThereAnyAimMercs = FALSE;
01731       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01732 
01733       for( sNextMercID = 0; sNextMercID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; sNextMercID++ )
01734       {
01735             pSoldier = &Menptr[ GetSoldierIDFromMercID( (UINT8) sNextMercID ) ];
01736 
01737             //check to see if any of the mercs are AIM mercs
01738             if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
01739             {
01740                   fIsThereAnyAimMercs = TRUE;
01741             }
01742       }
01743 
01744       return( fIsThereAnyAimMercs );
01745 }
